leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-虚拟筛选与对接生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 构象→对接→打分→再打分→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 对接引擎 + HPC/workflow + 平台

queries: [WEB] deep learning binding affinity prediction github
[WEB] consensus scoring tools drug discovery github

tools.name: PointDE
tools.one_line_profile: Protein docking evaluation using 3D point cloud neural networks
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of PointDE, a deep learning model that evaluates protein docking poses by representing them as 3D point clouds to predict the quality of the docking.

tools.name: GatorAffinity
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding affinity prediction using synthetic structural data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to boost protein-ligand binding affinity prediction by leveraging large-scale synthetic structural data for training.

tools.name: KinaseDocker2
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for kinase inhibitor binding and affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin and Docker-based tool specifically designed for predicting the binding modes and affinity of kinase inhibitors.

tools.name: protein_mutation_scoring
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring functions for protein mutation effects using ESM-2
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scoring functions leveraging the ESM-2 protein language model to predict the effects of mutations on protein sequences.

tools.name: protein-ligand-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based protein-ligand interaction prediction and XAI
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for analyzing protein-ligand interactions using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) and Explainable AI (XAI) techniques.

tools.name: iScore
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based scoring function for de novo drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of iScore, a machine learning-based scoring function designed to evaluate compounds in de novo drug discovery pipelines.

tools.name: Generalized-Score-Functions-for-Causal-Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized score-based method for causal discovery
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of generalized score functions for causal discovery, enabling the identification of causal structures from data.

tools.name: NeoBert
tools.one_line_profile: Neoantigen-HLA binding affinity prediction using BERT
tools.detailed_description: A BERT-based deep learning model specifically designed to predict the binding affinity between neoantigens and HLA molecules, integrating biological features.

tools.name: BINDKIN
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for kinase-ligand interaction point mutations
tools.detailed_description: A structural benchmark dataset and toolset for measuring the impact of point mutations on kinase-ligand interactions.

tools.name: BACPI
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-directional attention neural network for compound-protein interaction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model using bi-directional attention mechanisms to predict compound-protein interactions and binding affinity.

tools.name: ms2rescore
tools.one_line_profile: AI-assisted rescoring of peptide identifications in proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A modular platform for AI-assisted rescoring of peptide identifications from mass spectrometry data, improving identification rates.

tools.name: spectrum_similarity
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring functions for comparing MS/MS spectra
tools.detailed_description: A library of scoring functions designed to calculate the similarity between mass spectrometry (MS/MS) spectra.

tools.name: fpocket
tools.one_line_profile: Fast protein pocket detection algorithm based on Voronoi tessellation
tools.detailed_description: A very fast open source protein pocket detection algorithm based on Voronoi tessellation, widely used for identifying binding sites and extracting pocket descriptors.

tools.name: IPSAE
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function for interprotein interactions in AlphaFold models
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function designed to evaluate interprotein interactions within structures predicted by AlphaFold2 and AlphaFold3.

tools.name: RNAdvisor
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated wrapper for RNA 3D structure evaluation metrics
tools.detailed_description: A docker-based wrapper that integrates multiple metrics and scoring functions for the evaluation of RNA 3D structures.

tools.name: plif_validity
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for assessing interaction recovery of predicted protein-ligand poses
tools.detailed_description: Code and notebooks for assessing the interaction recovery of predicted protein-ligand poses, useful for validating docking results.

tools.name: MD-IFP
tools.one_line_profile: MD trajectory analysis using protein-ligand Interaction Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing Molecular Dynamics (MD) trajectories by calculating and monitoring protein-ligand Interaction Fingerprints (IFPs) over time.

tools.name: pocketoptimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Binding pocket optimization using force fields and scoring functions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing binding pockets based on force fields and docking scoring functions to improve ligand binding prediction.

tools.name: dock2interaction_profile
tools.one_line_profile: Batch analysis of protein-ligand interactions from docking results
tools.detailed_description: A script wrapper around PLIP to perform batch analysis of protein-ligand interactions derived from Smina/Vina docking results.

tools.name: CaFE_Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for binding affinity prediction using free energy methods
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin that facilitates binding affinity prediction using end-point free energy methods such as MM/PBSA or MM/GBSA.

tools.name: otter-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced representation for drug target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method that enriches protein sequence and SMILES drug databases with a large Knowledge Graph to improve drug target binding affinity prediction.

tools.name: MGDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Multigranular representation learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that explores multigranular representations to predict drug-target binding affinity, aiding in virtual screening and drug discovery.

tools.name: DeepDTAF
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning architecture for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that utilizes local and global features of proteins and ligands to predict binding affinity, supporting structure-based drug design.

tools.name: AutoSF
tools.one_line_profile: Automated search for bilinear scoring functions in knowledge graph learning
tools.detailed_description: An automated machine learning (AutoML) tool designed to search for effective bilinear scoring functions for knowledge graph embedding, optimizing performance on link prediction tasks.

tools.name: ERAS
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient relation-aware scoring function search for knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for efficiently searching for relation-aware scoring functions in knowledge graph embeddings, improving upon standard AutoML methods for KGE.

tools.name: SCORE (SLAM)
tools.one_line_profile: Saturated Consensus Relocalization in Semantic Line Maps
tools.detailed_description: A robotics algorithm for relocalization in semantic line maps using saturated consensus, applicable in SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) tasks.

tools.name: GPCNDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target binding affinity prediction using cross-attention networks
tools.detailed_description: A model for predicting drug-target binding affinity that integrates graph features and pharmacophores via cross-attention networks.

tools.name: Seeing Without Looking
tools.one_line_profile: Contextual rescoring of object detections for AP maximization
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision tool that uses contextual information to rescore object detections, aiming to maximize Average Precision (AP) in detection tasks.

tools.name: CHOKO
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus rescoring of protein-protein docking poses
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the consensus rescoring of protein-protein docking poses, utilizing the DockingPP library to improve docking predictions.

tools.name: Affinity2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target binding affinity prediction using representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting drug-target binding affinity by combining representation learning, graph mining, and machine learning techniques.

tools.name: MolScore
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scoring function for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive scoring framework to evaluate and guide generative models in de novo molecular design, supporting various objective functions and metrics.

tools.name: Alfalfa
tools.one_line_profile: Web service for runtime interaction with building energy models
tools.detailed_description: A platform enabling runtime interaction and control of building energy models (OpenStudio/EnergyPlus/Modelica) via REST APIs, used for energy optimization research.

tools.name: DualBind
tools.one_line_profile: 3D structure-based deep learning for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model using a dual-loss framework to predict protein-ligand binding affinity from 3D structural data.

tools.name: MSBooster
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning feature augmentation for PSM rescoring
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates deep learning-based features to improve Peptide-Spectrum Match (PSM) rescoring in proteomics, designed to work with Percolator.

tools.name: PaccMann Kinase Binding
tools.one_line_profile: Kinase binding residues analysis for affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A module from the PaccMann project focusing on comparing active site and full kinase sequences for drug-target affinity prediction.

tools.name: TFAIP Hybrid CTC-S2S
tools.one_line_profile: Rescoring sequence-to-sequence models for text recognition
tools.detailed_description: A framework for rescoring Sequence-to-Sequence models using CTC-Prefixes to improve text line recognition accuracy.

tools.name: gnina-torch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GNINA scoring function
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the GNINA molecular docking scoring function, enabling integration into deep learning workflows for drug discovery.

tools.name: bg_control
tools.one_line_profile: Blood glucose outcome improvement and meal scoring
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing time-series blood glucose data, identifying unlabelled meals, and developing meal-scoring functions to improve diabetes management outcomes.

tools.name: SCORCH
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function and docking pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Deployable code for the SCORCH scoring function and associated docking pipeline, designed for evaluating protein-ligand interactions.

tools.name: IoT Attack Detection
tools.one_line_profile: ML-based attack and anomaly detection for IoT sensors
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework for detecting attacks and anomalies in IoT sensor networks, comparing various algorithms like Random Forest and ANN.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D XFEM solver for multiple crack propagation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM) to solve 2D linear-elastic fracture problems involving multiple crack propagations.

tools.name: SCORE (Bioinfo)
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus tool for detecting differentially expressed genes in bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A consensus-based tool for identifying differentially expressed genes in bacterial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: multiscorer
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple metric functions for scikit-learn cross-validation
tools.detailed_description: A utility module that enables the use of multiple scoring metrics simultaneously within scikit-learn's cross_val_score function.

tools.name: XLM-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Program for scoring protein structures based on crosslinking mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed to score and validate protein structural models using experimental data from crosslinking mass spectrometry (XL-MS), specifically supporting MonoLinks (MoDS), Crosslinks (MNXL), and both (XLMO).

tools.name: TopoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Topological transformer for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that utilizes topological data analysis and transformer architectures to predict the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: DeepGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework combining graph neural networks and sequence modeling to predict drug-target binding affinity, utilizing SMILES and protein sequences as inputs.

tools.name: AA-Score-Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to predict the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes, likely utilizing amino acid specific scoring contributions.

tools.name: IPDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Binding-aware 3D molecule diffusion model with interaction priors
tools.detailed_description: A 3D molecular generation framework that incorporates protein-ligand interaction priors into diffusion models to generate molecules with high binding affinity and valid conformations.

tools.name: aafragpy
tools.one_line_profile: High-energy hadronic interaction model implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the AAfrag model for simulating high-energy hadronic interactions, based on QGSJET-II-04m, used in particle physics and astrophysics simulations.

tools.name: SIGN
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware interactive graph neural networks for binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (Structure-aware Interactive Graph Neural Networks) for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity by modeling spatial and topological interactions.

tools.name: NRLMFb
tools.one_line_profile: Beta-distribution-rescored matrix factorization for DTI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method improving drug-target interaction prediction using Neighborhood Regularized Logistic Matrix Factorization with Beta-distribution rescoring.

tools.name: dockit
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput molecular docking workflow using Vina engines
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool for performing high-throughput molecular docking against multiple targets and ligands, utilizing Vina-series docking engines.

tools.name: AUTOSURF
tools.one_line_profile: Automated construction of global potential energy surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A software package for robustly computing electronic energies and automating the construction of global potential energy surfaces (PES), particularly for systems with highly anisotropic interactions.

tools.name: SAnDReS
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis of docking results and scoring functions
tools.detailed_description: A computational environment for the development and statistical analysis of machine-learning models for predicting ligand-binding affinity and evaluating docking results.

tools.name: Sfcnn
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN-based scoring function for protein-ligand binding
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function model utilizing 3D convolutional neural networks to predict the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: MAGI
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolite-gene annotation consensus scoring tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to score and find consensus between metabolite identifications and gene annotations to improve metabolomics and genomics integration.

tools.name: FLOWUnsteady
tools.one_line_profile: Interactional aerodynamics and acoustics solver
tools.detailed_description: A solver for interactional aerodynamics and acoustics, specifically designed for multirotor aircraft and wind energy applications, simulating unsteady flow physics.

tools.name: DeepRescore
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based PSM rescoring tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rescoring peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs) in proteomics by leveraging deep learning-derived peptide features to improve identification accuracy.

tools.name: GEMS
tools.one_line_profile: GNN and transfer learning for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction that combines Graph Neural Networks (GNN) with transfer learning from protein language models.

tools.name: MDeePred
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-channel deep chemogenomic model for binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A multi-channel deep learning approach for chemogenomic modeling to predict receptor-ligand binding affinities in drug discovery.

tools.name: ProLIF (cbouy)
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints library
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes, facilitating the analysis of molecular interactions from docking or MD simulations.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to generate and analyze interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes, supporting data from various molecular modeling software.

tools.name: DeltaVina
tools.one_line_profile: A scoring function for protein-ligand docking based on AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: DeltaVina is a scoring function designed to improve the accuracy of protein-ligand docking. It is often used in conjunction with a modified version of AutoDock Vina (vina4dv) to evaluate binding poses and affinities.

tools.name: vina4dv
tools.one_line_profile: Modified AutoDock Vina engine for DeltaVina scoring
tools.detailed_description: A fork of AutoDock Vina specifically modified to support the DeltaVina scoring function. It serves as the docking engine to apply the DeltaVina scoring terms during the docking process.

tools.name: EasyDock
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated and parallelized molecular docking pipeline
tools.detailed_description: EasyDock is a Python-based pipeline for automating molecular docking tasks. It supports distributed environments, making it suitable for large-scale virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: SMPLIP-Score
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of absolute ligand-protein binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: SMPLIP-Score is a tool for predicting the absolute binding affinity between ligands and proteins. Developed by the College of Pharmacy at Gachon University, it utilizes machine learning approaches for scoring.

tools.name: Uni-Dock-Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets for evaluating Uni-Dock performance
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of datasets and benchmarking tests designed to evaluate the performance and accuracy of the Uni-Dock docking system. It serves as a standard reference for validating docking results.

tools.name: EnOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble Optimizer for docking and consensus-score analysis
tools.detailed_description: EnOpt (Ensemble Optimizer) is a tool designed to streamline ensemble-docking workflows and perform consensus-score analysis, helping to improve the reliability of virtual screening results.

tools.name: AnnapuRNA
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function for RNA-small molecule interactions
tools.detailed_description: AnnapuRNA is a specialized scoring function developed for predicting and evaluating interactions between RNA molecules and small molecule ligands, addressing a specific niche in docking.

tools.name: ACID
tools.one_line_profile: Auto in silico Consensus Inverse Docking for drug repurposing
tools.detailed_description: ACID (Auto in silico Consensus Inverse Docking) is a tool and web server backend designed for drug repurposing. It evaluates binding affinities between a small molecule and multiple protein targets using consensus inverse docking methods.

tools.name: GNINA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for molecular docking and scoring
tools.detailed_description: GNINA is a molecular docking software that utilizes deep convolutional neural networks to score protein-ligand interactions and optimize binding poses. It is a fork of Smina/AutoDock Vina with advanced DL scoring capabilities.

tools.name: Phinder
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore feature identification using GNINA fragment docking
tools.detailed_description: Phinder is a tool for the semi-automatic identification of pharmacophore features from unbound receptor structures. It leverages GNINA's fragment docking capabilities to map potential interaction sites.

tools.name: HAC-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Attention-Based CNN for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: HAC-Net is a deep learning model that combines attention mechanisms with convolutional neural networks to predict protein-ligand binding affinities with high accuracy.

tools.name: T-ALPHA
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical transformer-based network for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: T-ALPHA is a deep neural network utilizing a hierarchical transformer architecture for predicting protein-ligand binding affinities. It incorporates uncertainty-aware self-learning for improved protein-specific alignment.

tools.name: Binding Affinity Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for protein-protein binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset maintained by the HADDOCK team for evaluating protein-protein binding affinity prediction methods.

tools.name: PRODIGY-LIG
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of protein-small molecule binding affinities
tools.detailed_description: PRODIGY-LIG is a structure-based method for predicting the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes. It is part of the PRODIGY family of tools from the HADDOCK group.

tools.name: CoPRA
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-domain pretrained model for protein-RNA binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: CoPRA (Bridging Cross-domain Pretrained Sequence Models with Complex Structures) is a deep learning framework designed to predict protein-RNA binding affinity. It integrates cross-domain pretrained sequence models with complex structural information to enhance prediction accuracy.

tools.name: DeepDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepDTA is a deep learning-based method that predicts drug-target binding affinity using only the sequence information of both targets (proteins) and drugs (compounds). It eliminates the need for 3D structural data, making it applicable to large-scale screening.

tools.name: PSICHIC
tools.one_line_profile: Physicochemical graph neural network for protein-ligand interaction fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: PSICHIC is a graph neural network model that learns protein-ligand interaction fingerprints directly from sequence data. It incorporates physicochemical constraints to provide interpretable predictions of binding interactions without relying on 3D crystal structures.

tools.name: R4DSXML
tools.one_line_profile: R package for handling CDISC Dataset-XML and Define-XML
tools.detailed_description: R4DSXML is an R package designed to import and handle CDISC Dataset-XML and Define-XML files. It supports the standardization and exchange of clinical trial data, facilitating regulatory submissions and data analysis in pharmaceutical research.

tools.name: deltaVinaXGB
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning based protein-ligand scoring function
tools.detailed_description: deltaVinaXGB is a scoring function for protein-ligand docking that combines classical physics-based terms from Vina with a gradient boosting machine (XGBoost) to improve the accuracy of binding affinity predictions and virtual screening ranking.

tools.name: MBP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task Bioassay Pre-training for affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: MBP (Multi-task Bioassay Pre-training) is a framework for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction. It utilizes a pre-training strategy on large-scale bioassay data to learn robust molecular representations, which are then fine-tuned for affinity prediction tasks.

tools.name: ProteusAI
tools.one_line_profile: Library for ML-driven protein engineering and interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: ProteusAI is a Python library designed for machine learning-driven protein engineering. It provides workflows for protein structure prediction, mutational effect estimation, and protein-ligand interaction analysis, serving as a comprehensive toolkit for protein design.

tools.name: ANTIPASTI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for antibody binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: ANTIPASTI (ANTIbody Predictor of Affinity from STructural Information) is a deep learning model that predicts the binding affinity of antibodies based on their three-dimensional structural data, aiding in the computational design and selection of therapeutic antibodies.

tools.name: DOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning based docking decoy evaluation method
tools.detailed_description: DOVE is a deep learning-based method for evaluating protein docking decoys. It distinguishes near-native structures from incorrect docking poses by analyzing the interface properties, serving as a scoring function for protein-protein docking.

tools.name: GNN_DOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for protein docking model evaluation
tools.detailed_description: GNN_DOVE is a graph neural network-based scoring function for evaluating protein docking models. It represents protein interfaces as graphs to capture topological and physicochemical features for distinguishing correct docking poses.

tools.name: CAPLA
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-attention based protein-ligand affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: CAPLA is a deep learning model for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity. It employs a cross-attention mechanism to effectively capture the interaction features between protein sequences and ligand molecular graphs.

tools.name: OpenXRayMC
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo radiation dose scoring for x-ray imaging
tools.detailed_description: OpenXRayMC is a Monte Carlo simulation application designed for calculating radiation dose distributions in diagnostic x-ray imaging. It allows for precise dose scoring in various geometries, supporting medical physics research and safety assessment.

tools.name: plantain
tools.one_line_profile: AI-based pose scoring function for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: plantain is a molecular docking tool that utilizes an artificial intelligence-based scoring function. It is designed to provide fast and accurate predictions of ligand binding poses and affinities, facilitating virtual screening workflows.

tools.name: PIGNet2
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed deep learning model for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A versatile deep learning-based protein-ligand interaction prediction model designed for binding affinity scoring and virtual screening. It integrates physics-informed features to improve generalization and accuracy in scoring.

tools.name: Nanome Docking Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Docking interface plugin for Nanome VR platform
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Nanome virtual reality molecular design platform that triggers docking calculations using Autodock 4, Smina, and Vina directly within the VR environment.

tools.name: PELE Platform
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for Protein Energy Landscape Exploration (PELE)
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper platform to launch various PELE features including AdaptivePELE, Markov State Models (MSM), Ligand Growing, and Glide Rescoring for drug discovery and molecular dynamics tasks.

tools.name: USMPep
tools.one_line_profile: MHC binding affinity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the binding affinity of peptides to the Major Histocompatibility Complex (MHC), aiding in immunology and vaccine design.

tools.name: RF-Score-VS
tools.one_line_profile: Random Forest scoring function for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A Random Forest-based protein-ligand scoring function specifically tailored for virtual screening tasks, part of the ODDT ecosystem.

tools.name: RF-Score-VS Binary
tools.one_line_profile: Binary classification version of RF-Score-VS
tools.detailed_description: A binary classification variant of the RF-Score-VS scoring function, designed to classify protein-ligand poses as active or inactive.

tools.name: Inferred-functional-risk-scoring
tools.one_line_profile: Functionally informed genetic risk scores generator
tools.detailed_description: R scripts for generating functionally informed genetic risk scores using Transcriptome-Wide Association Studies (TWAS) data.

tools.name: MHCflurry
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide-MHC I binding affinity predictor
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive package for peptide-MHC I binding affinity prediction, including training and prediction modules, widely used in neoantigen identification.

tools.name: pUniFind
tools.one_line_profile: De novo sequencing and database search rescoring model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for rescoring in de novo sequencing and database search for proteomics, aiming to improve identification accuracy.

tools.name: DeepSeqPan
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based pan model for peptide-MHC I binding
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting peptide-MHC class I binding affinity using sequence information, supporting pan-specific predictions.

tools.name: DeepSeqPanII
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based pan model for peptide-MHC II binding
tools.detailed_description: A successor to DeepSeqPan, specifically designed for predicting peptide-MHC class II binding affinities.

tools.name: CrystalExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure analysis and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: Software for crystal structure analysis, featuring Hirshfeld surface analysis and calculation of intermolecular interaction energies.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Profiler
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze and visualize non-covalent protein-ligand interactions in PDB files, detecting hydrogen bonds, hydrophobic contacts, pi-stacking, etc.

tools.name: PLINDER
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Ligand Interaction Dataset and Evaluation Resource
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive resource and dataset for training and evaluating protein-ligand interaction models, facilitating benchmarking in drug discovery.

tools.name: PandaMap-Color
tools.one_line_profile: Customizable Protein-Ligand Interaction Mapper
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for mapping protein-ligand interactions with customizable color schemes to enhance interpretability.

tools.name: NAMD-MMPBGBSA
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for NAMD MD and free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to run NAMD Molecular Dynamics simulations and perform free energy calculations using LIE, MMPBSA, and MMGBSA methods, optimized for Google Colab.

tools.name: Causal-learn
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for causal discovery and inference
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for causal discovery that includes independence tests and score functions, widely used in scientific causal analysis and AI for Science research.

tools.name: Pymol_Script
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL script for protein-ligand interaction imaging
tools.detailed_description: A utility script for PyMOL to automate the generation of high-quality protein-ligand interaction images for publication or analysis.

tools.name: BAPULM
tools.one_line_profile: Binding affinity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A computational model for predicting binding affinity in drug discovery contexts.

tools.name: DEBplant
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Energy Budget plant model
tools.detailed_description: Scripts implementing a Dynamic Energy Budget (DEB) plant model that accounts for microclimate interactions, used in ecological and biological modeling.

tools.name: 3DProtDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for drug-target affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing residue-level protein graphs to predict drug-target binding affinity.

tools.name: dockECR
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking and ranking protocol
tools.detailed_description: An open consensus docking and ranking protocol designed to improve virtual screening results by combining outputs from multiple docking tools.

tools.name: Docking_py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for automating molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies and automates the use of Smina, Vina, Qvina2, and Qvinaw docking software for virtual screening workflows.

tools.name: SIEVE-Score
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction energy-based virtual screening method
tools.detailed_description: A virtual screening method based on Random Forest that utilizes interaction energy terms to score and rank compounds.

tools.name: ML_PSI
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor for polymer-surface adhesive free energies
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning model for predicting adhesive free energies of polymer-surface interactions, useful in materials science.

tools.name: DLSCORE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning scoring function for binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based scoring function designed to predict protein-ligand binding affinity, trained on the PDBbind refined set.

tools.name: PocketAnchor
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based pocket representation learning for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that learns structure-based pocket representations to predict protein-ligand interactions, serving as a scoring function for drug discovery.

tools.name: MolDockLab
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven workflow for consensus Structure-Based Virtual Screening (SBVS)
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter Notebook-based workflow designed to identify the best balanced consensus scoring strategy for structure-based virtual screening campaigns against specific targets.

tools.name: Oktoberfest
tools.one_line_profile: Rescoring and spectral library generation pipeline for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A proteomics pipeline that uses deep learning (via Prosit) to generate spectral libraries and rescore peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs) to increase identification rates.

tools.name: ECIFGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Water Network-Augmented model for Protein-Ligand Binding Affinity Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that incorporates water network information into graph representations to predict protein-ligand binding affinities.

tools.name: DeepDTA-tf
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of DeepDTA for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of the DeepDTA model, which uses sequence-based deep learning to predict drug-target binding affinities.

tools.name: DeepDrugDomain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for drug-target interaction and binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A versatile Python toolkit designed for streamlined preprocessing and accurate prediction of drug-target interactions (DTI) and binding affinities using deep learning.

tools.name: orthrus_metaproteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Metaproteomics pipeline combining de novo sequencing and database searching
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for metaproteomics data analysis that integrates Transformer-based de novo sequencing (Casanovo) with database searching and rescoring tools (Sage + Mokapot).

tools.name: Fibro-CoSANet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal network for pulmonary fibrosis progression prediction
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end multi-modal deep learning model utilizing CT images and demographic data to predict FVC decline in Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis patients.

tools.name: OnionNet-2
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based protein-ligand binding affinity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A convolutional neural network (CNN) model designed to predict protein-ligand binding affinity based on inter-molecular contact features.

tools.name: AttentionDTA (BIBM)
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-based model for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing attention mechanisms to predict drug-target binding affinities from sequence data.

tools.name: AttentionDTA (TCBB)
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based deep learning with attention for DTA prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the AttentionDTA model for predicting drug-target binding affinity, published in TCBB.

tools.name: MMPD-DTA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal deep learning model for DTA prediction
tools.detailed_description: A multi-modal deep learning framework for predicting drug-target binding affinity, integrating different data modalities.

tools.name: OnionNet-SFCT
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function correction term for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: A tool that improves protein-ligand docking and screening accuracies by incorporating a machine learning-based scoring function correction term.

tools.name: dockingML
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MD, Docking, and Machine Learning in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that integrates molecular dynamics (MD), molecular docking, and machine learning methods into a unified drug discovery pipeline.

tools.name: OnionNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A multiple-layer deep neural network based on inter-molecular contact features for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity.

tools.name: IGN
tools.one_line_profile: InteractionGraphNet for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep graph representation learning framework (InteractionGraphNet) for accurate protein-ligand interaction predictions and virtual screening.

tools.name: InteractionGraphNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep graph framework for structure-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep graph representation learning framework designed for accurate protein-ligand interaction prediction and large-scale structure-based virtual screening.
